column5: We invite you to come and stay at our beautifully decorated Villa with all the comforts of home at the Island on Lake Travis and enjoy the tranquility and peace it has to offer.  Here you will feel away from all the hustle and bustle of city and enjoy beautiful hill country & lake Views. The villa is very spacious (845 sq. ft) and bright. The kitchen is very well equipped with pots and pans, coffee maker and basic spices. You will enjoy beautiful views from our wrap around balcony.
